page.title: 15SCHOOLS IN CAISTOR
page.content: There are 3 schools in this block: {Nettleton County Primary School,} Headmistress: Miss P.Thorpe {Caistor {Primary School,}Headmaster:Mr.J.W. Sivil.{Caistor Grammar School,} Headmaster: Mr.T.J.Foulkes. { Caistor Primary School}was the first joint Methodist/C of E school in the country.Its capacity is 362 pupils.On roll in 1985 were just under 300. { Nettleton Primary school}is smaller. { Caistor Grammar School}had 340 on roll in 1985.Of these,92 were{boarders This is a selective school:pupils have to pass the'11 plus' exam to be accepted.Those not selected for the grammar school attend Caistor Yarborough Secondary Modern School which is just east of this block. All the schools are suffering{falling rolls because of the fall in the birth rate between 1974 and 1979.
